lecturers.name: Steffi Tan
lecturers.title: Course Lead, Web Lecturer
lecturers.description: Hi! I'm a second year studying Computer Science and Cognitive Science. I like crocheting, lockpicking, Valorant, soup, and Kung Fu Panda 3.

lecturers.name: Tyler Sameshima
lecturers.title: Course Lead, Web Lecturer
lecturers.description: Hey all! I'm Tyler, a third year majoring in CS. In my free time, I like playing video games, listening to music, and learning new languages. Feel free to reach out if you want to talk!

lecturers.name: Tony Hong
lecturers.title: iOS Lecturer
lecturers.description: Hello! I'm Tony and I'm currently a junior studying EECS. Some of my academic/industry interests are backend engineering and systems engineering. I also enjoy playing badminton, watching kdramas/anime, and listening to music during my free time.

lecturers.name: Jordan Yee
lecturers.title: iOS Lecturer
lecturers.description: Hi! My name is Jordan. I’m a third year studying EECS. At Cal, I’m involved in Cal Hacks, Product Space, and ANOVA. In my free time, you can generally find me playing basketball/football, working out, or just chilling at the beach. Feel free to reach out if you wanna talk gym, product management, or anything else!

tas.name: Andy Huang
tas.title: iOS TA
tas.description: Hi! I’m Andy and I’m a third year studying computer science. I spend way too much time on Netflix and watching anime! Feel free to talk to me if you have show recommendations or have questions regarding iOS development!

tas.name: Alexander Goldberg
tas.title: Web TA
tas.description: I'm a second year CS + Legal Studies major. Ask me about fencing, hiking, cooking, or the circadian rhythms of malaria parasites.

tas.name: Oliver Carmont
tas.title: Web TA
tas.description: Hi! I’m Oliver. I’m a sophomore studying CS. I’m an international student from Spain and Australia. At Berkeley, I’m involved in Cal Hacks, Codeology and IM Soccer.
